en.title: [2024] Businesses
en.description: Profile, startup rate, and shutdown rate of businesses, with disaggregation by sector and state.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest data on businesses in Malaysia, covering the profile, startup rate, and shutdown rate of businesses, with disaggregation by sector and state.

bm.title: [2024] Perniagaan
bm.description: Profil, kadar penubuhan, dan kadar penutupan perniagaan, dengan pecahan mengikut sektor dan negeri.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data terkini bagi perniagaan di Malaysia, meliputi profil, kadar penubuhan, dan kadar penutupan perniagaan, dengan pecahan mengikut sektor dan negeri.
